This interactive tool calculates the velocity and damage given to an entity by an [[explosion]].
<onlyinclude>
{| class="wikitable calculator-container calculatorgadget-enabled"
! colspan=4 | Positions
|-
! Explosion X
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=ex|size=20|default=0.0}}
! Entity X
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=px|size=20|default=1.0}}
|-
! Explosion Y
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=ey|size=20|default=0.061250001192092896}}
! Entity Y
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=py|size=20|default=0.0}}
|-
! Explosion Z
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=ez|size=20|default=0.0}}
! Entity Z
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=pz|size=20|default=0.0}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dx|formula=px-ex|default=1.0}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dy|formula=py-ey|default=-0.061250001192092896}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dz|formula=pz-ez|default=0.0}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=distance|formula=sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz)|default=1.001874025337533}}
|-
! colspan=4 | Exposure
|-
! Entity [[Hitbox|width]]
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=w|size=20|default=0.9800000190734863}}
! Entity [[Hitbox|height]]
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=h|size=20|default=0.9800000190734863}}
|-
! Layout
| <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expx|formula=ceil(2*w+1)|default=3}}×{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expy|formula=ceil(2*h+1)|default=3}}×{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expz|formula=ceil(2*w+1)|default=3}}</code>
! Spacing
| <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expxs|formula=w/(2*w+1)|default=0.33108108325802205}}</code> × <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expys|formula=h/(2*h+1)|default=0.33108108325802205}}</code> × <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expzs|formula=w/(2*w+1)|default=0.33108108325802205}}</code>
|-
! Negative corner
| <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expxn|formula=(1-floor(2*w+1)/(2*w+1))/2|default=0.1621621665160441}}</code>, <code>0</code>, <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expzn|formula=(1-floor(2*w+1)/(2*w+1))/2|default=0.1621621665160441}}</code>
! Positive corner
| <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expxp|formula=expxn+expxs*(expx-1)|default=0.8243243330320882}}</code>, <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expyp|formula=expys*(expy-1)|default=0.6621621665160441}}</code>, <code>{{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=expzp|formula=expzn+expzs*(expz-1)|default=0.8243243330320882}}</code>
|-
! colspan=4 | Effect on the entity
|-
! Power
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=power|size=20|default=4.0}}
! Exposure
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=exposureNumerator|size=9|default=27}} / {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=etotal|formula=expx*expy*expz|default=27}} {{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=exposure|formula=exposureNumerator/(expx*expy*expz)|default=1.0}}
|-
! Knockback multiplier
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=knockbackmult|size=20|default=1.0}}
! [[Hitbox|Eye height]]
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=eyeheight|size=20|default=0.0}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=diry|formula=(py+eyeheight)-ey|default=-0.061250001192092896}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dirmag|formula=sqrt(dx*dx + diry*diry + dz*dz)|default=1.001874025337533}}
|-
! [[Attribute|Knockback resistance]]
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=knockbackres|size=20|default=0.0}}
! Velocity X
| {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=vx|formula=dx/dirmag*speed|default=0.8731294800642211}} blocks/tick
|-
! Speed
| {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=speed|formula=(1-distance/(2*power))*exposure*knockbackmult*(1-knockbackres)|default=0.8747657468328084}} blocks/tick
! Velocity Y
| {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=vy|formula=diry/dirmag*speed|default=-0.053479181694784994}} blocks/tick
|-
! [[Damage]]
| {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=damage|formula=(speed*speed + speed)/2 * 7*(2*power) + 1|default=46.9375}}
! Velocity Z
| {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=vz|formula=dz/dirmag*speed|default=0.0}} blocks/tick
|}
</onlyinclude>
